channel.title: How to Change Spawn Point?
channel.description:
hello,
i just started building my own server again few years ago i had one to but i forgot how to change the Home Spawn like when you create a new character and u login u spawn somewhere and i want to change that spawn.

item.title: How to Change Spawn Point?
item.dc:creator: @no1toldme2 no1toldme2
item.description:
@no1toldme2 wrote:

You go into player.java or .cfg not sure and find the cords of where u start out, you can find out by the command ::mpos and you should ctrl+f and type the cord only the first one. Or you can just search the first cord in the files and change that.

Read full topic

item.title: How to Change Spawn Point?
item.dc:creator: @Dj_Nm.E Dj Nm.E
item.description:
@Dj_Nm.E wrote:

for [pi] is on config.java on your source. it usually has the name where //

Read full topic
